<<<<<<< HEAD
A sermon against selfe policy preached at White-Hall in Lent. By Isaac Bargrave ... Bargrave, Isaac, 1586-1643.
[4], 40 p.
Printed by Nicholas Okes, for Iohn Barlett, and Iohn Spencer, London : 1624.
The first leaf is blank. Variant: title page is a cancel and mostly reset, lacking "1621" in title, with imprint reading: London: printed by Nicholas Okes, for Iohn Barlett and Iohn Spencer, and are to be sold at the gilded Cup [i.e. by John Bartlett] in Cheape-side. 1624. Reproduction of the original in Cambridge University Library.
=======

Printed by Nicholas Okes, for Iohn Barlett, and Iohn Spencer, London : 1624.

Reproduction of the original in Cambridge University Library.
